div.p: When an action should be done. If the action is a series or recurs (e.g. daily blood sugar testing in the morning) then a Timing can be used to describe the periodicity.

publisher.value: HL7 Patient Care and Clinical Information Modeling Initiative Work Groups

description.value: When an action should be done. If the action is a series or recurs (e.g. daily blood sugar testing in the morning) then a Timing can be used to describe the periodicity.
